Producer: Mickey Liddell, Pete Shilaimon, Sean Ellis
Production Co: Salon Films, 22h22, LD Entertainment, Silver A, Studio Babelsberg Motion Pictures GmbH, Lucky Man Films, Zephyr Films
Synopsis: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).
Title: Anthropoid
